dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1064 IS: Medicare Mental Health Access Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Brown introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for treatment of clinical psychologists as physicians for purposes of furnishing clinical psychologist services under the Medicare program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Medicare Mental Health Access Act.

section.header: Treatment of clinical psychologists as physicians for purposes of furnishing clinical psychologist services

subsection.text: The first sentence of section 1861(r) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395x(r)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting before the period the following: , or (6) a clinical psychologist, but only with respect to the furnishing of qualified psychologist services described in subsection (ii) for which the psychologist is legally authorized to perform by the State and who is acting within the scope of the psychologist’s license (or other authorization under State law).

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply to items and services furnished on or after January 1, 2014.
